caption.p: Targeting host proteins and several steps of the viral life cycle by current therapeutic and alternative natural products (in red). HIV, human immunodeficiency viruses; RSV, respiratory syncytial virus; HBV, hepatitis B virus; HSV-1/2, herpes simplex virus-1/2, NtRTIs, nucleotide reverse transcriptase inhibitors; NRTIs, nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitors; and NNRTIs, non-nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitors; NAIs, neuraminidase inhibitors; PGC-1Î±, peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor gamma coactivator 1-alpha.
